alert.note: Alert for Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:18PM EDT until May 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...NORTHEASTERN RENSSELAER AND NORTHWESTERN BENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 517 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cambridge to near Bennington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hoosick Falls, Arlington, Salem, Shaftsbury, Granville, Hartford, Cambridge, Kingsbury, Porter, White Creek, North Bennington, Rupert, Sandgate, Argyle, Cossayuna, Center White Creek, Hoosick Junction, Sodom, Smiths Basin and Center Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
